oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Discussion - Legends of RCA Studio B - 2011-08-09
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Panel discussion and performances. Memories and reminiscences of Elvis Presley recording sessions in RCA Studio B with Harold Bradley, David Briggs, Norbert Putnam, Scotty Moore, D.J. Fontana, Gordon Stoker, Millie Kirkham, Bucky Barrett, Ronnie McDowell from RCA Studio B on Nashville's Music Row on August 9, 2011. Part of a capital campaign for the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Harold Bradley; David Briggs; Norbert Putnam; Scotty Moore; D.J. Fontana; Gordon Stoker; Millie Kirkham; Bucky Barrett;; Ronnie McDowell;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Discussion introduced by John Rumble. Include selected audio excerpts. Includes performances of; I Want You, I Need You, I Love You (Ronnie McDowell); (You're The) Devil In Disguise (Ronnie McDowell); Crying In The Chapel (Ronnie McDowell); It's Now Or Never (Ronnie McDowell); Are You Lonesome Tonight? (Ronnie McDowell); Angel (Ronnie McDowell); How Great Thou Art (Elvis Presley); Love Letters (Ronnie McDowell);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Presley, Elvis, 1935-1977; Bradley, Harold; Briggs, David; Moore, Scotty; Fontana, D.J.; Stoker, Gordon, 1924-2013; Kirkham, Millie; Barrett, Bucky; McDowell, Ronnie;
